directions: Pour egg, confectioners' sugar, white vinegar, lemon juice, salt, garlic powder, mustard, and paprika into a blender; pulse until mixture is frothy.
Turn the blender on to low and slowly pour olive oil into egg mixture until dressing thickens and emulsifies.
ingredients: 3/8 teaspoon salt, or more to taste
title: Paleo Miracle-Whipped Dressing
